mapper.select: SELECT FROM erp_bulk_material ebm WHERE ebm.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND data_status = 1
SELECT FROM erp_bulk_material ebm WHERE ebm.bulk_material_no = #{bulkMaterialNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND data_status = 1
SELECT FROM erp_order eo INNER JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON eo.order_no=ebm.order_no WHERE eo.data_status=1 AND eo.buyer_customer_id = #{customerId}
SELECT FROM erp_order eo INNER JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON eo.order_no=ebm.order_no WHERE eo.data_status=1 AND eo.buyer_customer_id = #{customerId} AND ebm.material_id = #{materialId}

select
from erp_bulk_material ebm where ebm.bulk_material_type = #{materialType, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ebm.material_model_id = #{materialModelId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ebm.data_status = 1
SELECT count(1) FROM erp_bulk_material ebm WHERE ebm.data_status=1 AND ebm.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT FROM erp_purchase_order epo LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order epro ON epro.purchase_order_id = epo.id AND epro.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order eso ON epro.purchase_receive_no = eso.refer_no AND eso.data_status=1 AND eso.cause_type=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_bulk_material esobm ON eso.stock_order_no = esobm.stock_order_no AND esobm.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON ebm.id=esobm.bulk_material_id AND ebm.data_status=1 WHERE esobm.item_refer_id = #{maps.purchaseReceiveOrderMaterialId} AND epo.data_status = 1 AND auto_allot_status != 1 LIMIT #{maps.start},#{maps.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM erp_purchase_order epo LEFT JOIN erp_purchase_receive_order epro ON epro.purchase_order_id = epo.id AND epro.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order eso ON epro.purchase_receive_no = eso.refer_no AND eso.data_status=1 AND eso.cause_type=1 LEFT JOIN erp_stock_order_bulk_material esobm ON eso.stock_order_no = esobm.stock_order_no AND esobm.data_status=1 LEFT JOIN erp_bulk_material ebm ON ebm.id=esobm.bulk_material_id AND ebm.data_status=1 WHERE esobm.item_refer_id = #{maps.purchaseReceiveOrderMaterialId} AND epo.data_status = 1 AND auto_allot_status != 1

set.if: order_no = CASE WHEN #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}='' THEN NULL ELSE #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} END,
current_equipment_id = CASE WHEN #{currentEquipmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}=0 THEN NULL ELSE #{currentEquipmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER} END,
current_equipment_no = CASE WHEN #{currentEquipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}='' THEN NULL ELSE #{currentEquipmentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} END,

mapper.insert:
insert into erp_bulk_material (bulk_material_no,bulk_material_type,is_main_material,bulk_material_name,material_id,material_no,order_no,current_warehouse_id,current_warehouse_position_id,owner_warehouse_id,owner_warehouse_position_id,brand_id,material_model_id,material_capacity_value,bulk_material_price,purchase_price,current_equipment_id,current_equipment_no,bulk_material_status,is_new,data_status,remark,create_time,create_user,update_time,update_user)
SELECT #{bulkMaterialDO.bulkMaterialNo},em.material_type, em.is_main_material, em.material_name ,#{bulkMaterialDO.materialId},em.material_no,#{bulkMaterialDO.orderNo},#{bulkMaterialDO.currentWarehouseId},#{bulkMaterialDO.currentWarehousePositionId},#{bulkMaterialDO.ownerWarehouseId},#{bulkMaterialDO.ownerWarehousePositionId}, em.brand_id,em.material_model_id,em.material_capacity_value,em.material_price,equipment_info.current_equipment_id ,#{bulkMaterialDO.currentEquipmentNo}, #{bulkMaterialDO.bulkMaterialStatus},#{bulkMaterialDO.isNew},#{bulkMaterialDO.dataStatus},#{bulkMaterialDO.remark}, #{bulkMaterialDO.createTime},#{bulkMaterialDO.createUser},#{bulkMaterialDO.updateTime},#{bulkMaterialDO.updateUser} FROM erp_material em LEFT JOIN (select epe.id as current_equipment_id from erp_product_equipment epe where epe.equipment_no = #{bulkMaterialDO.currentEquipmentNo}) equipment_info on 1=1 WHERE em.id = #{bulkMaterialDO.materialId}
mapper.update: UPDATE erp_bulk_material SET bulk_material_status = #{bulkMaterialStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE current_equipment_no = #{equipmentNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
